Detailed Description

This class is a set of connected waypoints in a chunk.

It may have connections to other waypoint sets when its chunk is bound.

int ChunkWaypointSet::find ( const WaypointSpaceVector3 &  point,
float &  bestDistanceSquared 
) [inline]

This finds the waypoint that contains the given point.

Parameters:
lpoint The point that is used to find the waypoint.
bestDistanceSquared The point must be closer than this to the waypoint. It is updated to the new best distance if a better waypoint is found.
Returns:
The index of the waypoint that contains the point, -1 if no waypoint contains the point.

int ChunkWaypointSet::find ( const WaypointSpaceVector3 &  point,
bool  ignoreHeight = false 
) [inline]

This finds the waypoint that contains the given point.

Parameters:
lpoint The point that is used to find the waypoint.
ignoreHeight Flag indicates vertical range should be considered in finding waypoint. If not, the best waypoint that is closest to give point is selected (of course the waypoint should contain projection of the given point regardless).
Returns:
The index of the waypoint that contains the point, -1 if no waypoint contains the point.

This adds or removes us from the given chunk.
